snippet: Alex Morgan scored on a header with 30 seconds left in extra time to give the United States women’s soccer team a 4-3 victory and a spot in the Olympic gold-medal match against Japan.
abstract: American forward Alex Morgan scores on a header with 30 seconds left in extra time to give the United States women’s soccer team a 4-3 victory over Canada and a spot in the Olympic gold-medal match against Japan.
lead_paragraph: Alex Morgan scored on a header with 30 seconds left in extra time to give the United States women’s soccer team a 4-3 victory and a spot in the Olympic gold-medal match against Japan.

headline.seo: In a Thriller, Late U.S. Goal Sinks Canada in Women’s Soccer
headline.main: U.S. Women Win a Thriller on a Header
headline.print_headline: U.S. Women Win a Thriller On a Header
